my way: my way by following the natural features of the environment, such as the sun, stars, and rivers.
use my sense of smell: use my sense of smell to find my way, as certain smells can be used to identify specific locations.
rely on landmarks: rely on landmarks such as buildings, trees, and other natural features to guide my way.
ask for directions: ask for directions from locals or other people who may know the area.
use my intuition: use my intuition and sense of direction to find my way, as I may be able to sense the general direction I need to go based on my surroundings.
